meta.description: Optimize meal planning to meet nutritional requirements at minimal cost.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Types of food items available for meal planning.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content per unit of each food item.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content per unit of each food item.

params.name: calories
params.description: Caloric content per unit of each food item.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each food item to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 84 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbohydrates_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 117 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1554 calories are consumed.
